channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No streey bins at sr and sm bus stop on whitefoot lane, 10th July
item.description:
I would like to report that there are no street bins at these bus stop therefore people are dumping rubbish on the pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitefoot Lane, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Rubbish, 10th July
item.description:
Several rubbish bags, a high chair and other bits have been dumped outside our Pharmacy. It also seems to contain food waste, which in this heat, is causing issues. Seems bags/ items were dumped between 9pm and 6am last night/this morning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewson Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daneswood Avenue, Southend, London

item.title: 24 broken street uplights Hazelmere Pedestrian area, 10th July
item.description:
All 24 ground uplights are broken, possibly due to tree root damage. Apart from 1 street light, these are the ONLY lighting in this area. The area is pitch black at night.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad flyipping at 4/6 Cranley Gardens, 10th July
item.description:
Out of collection times fly tipping almost weekly here. Domestic rubbish and a large carpet fly tipped on pavement. Started on 8th July and added too by others. In contravention to the regular Monday & Thursday collections. Becoming disgusting with food mess from scavenging animals. Delivery boxes with the address of one of the flytippers visible. RBKC contact them please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Cranley Gardens, Brompton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
